venue.name: Acacia at Indian Meadows Club House

item.description:
Upcoming Event .. October 10th 2009
We're having another Dance Party. Come drink, and dance to the music of DJBobby'D.

8pm - 12:30am. Buy your tickets online, or at the door. YOU SAVE BEFORE 9:30pm.

Come Join us for a Fabulous Night of dance music, and shake your booty down with DJBobby'D. http://www.acaciafunc... .

See you there! Tickets are ....Singles$10.00 Online at (http://www.djbobbyd.c...) and $10.00 at the door "Before" 9:30pm, $15.00 at the door "After" 9:30pm. Couples $25.00 at the door "After" 9:30pm. You DEFINITELY do not want to miss this one... All sales are FINAL. No Refunds.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me at the DJ booth
item.name: " SATURDAY NIGHT DANCE PARTY "
